summary:
Before to download copy and save a music folder locate in your data folder.
Download and put to data folder, and then overwrite. Done.
descriptionHtml:
[size=7][color=#FFD700][b]Installation:[/b][/color][/size]

NMM download:
Donwload with NMM, activate and launch game. done.
esp and esm isn't neccessary.

Manual download:
Before to download copy and save a music folder locate in your data folder.
Download and put to data folder, and then overwrite. Done.

[size=4][color=#FF4500][b]Music folder must be locate in skyrimdata [/b][/color][/size]

All music is not replaced.

Battledrake, exploring, fighting, dungeon is added.


In progress: tavern and town.


example of soundtrack :

[Youtube]uiSIPxYGkJY[/Youtube]

[Youtube]bn09Wc2tPtY[/Youtube]

[Youtube]QSaryH9rOoI[/Youtube]

[Youtube]i8nNAwhCvAo[/Youtube]


[size=5][color=#ADFF2F][b]You want more ? would you be surprised ? download it. [/b][/color][/size]

[size=5][color=#DC143C][b]Thanks and don't forget to endorse ! enjoy ! ![/b][/color][/size]
author: romtigroux
